experience.title: DATA ANAL YST INTERN
description: Processed andcleaned 10,000+ investment records ,improving dataquality foranalysis.
Implemented PCA,reducing feature dimensions by30%,optimizing computational efficiency.
Conducted K-Means clustering ,segmenting customers into5+distinct investment groups ,leading tobetter-targeted financial strategies.
Developed customized investment plans ,increasing portfolio returns by15% based oncustomer segmentation insights.

projects.name: CARDEKHO VEHICLE RECOMMENDATION SYSTEM
description: Developed anmachine learning-powered recommendation engine using collaborative filtering ,enhancing personalized carsuggestions based onprice, specifications, andfeatures.
Engineered arobust datapipeline byscraping real-time vehicle data using Selenium &SQL,transforming unstructured dataintostructured insights with30+engineered features .

projects.name: DEEPDIVE AI
description: Developed anAI model for predicting deepsea oil and gas reservoirs using seismic data.
Improved the model's accuracy by optimizing hyperparameters and incorporating a transfer learning approach.

projects.name: Financial Fraud Detection System
description: Developed analgorithm for detecting financial fraud using machine learning techniques.
Achieved anaccuracy rate of 95% in detecting fraudulent transactions.
